name: surReal
description:
We control this planet.

But we are controlled by what is out there.

Sounds surreal, but is it?

surReal is a game about us.

It shows how we life in our "bubble".

But we are just creatures, thinking we are th greatest.

What if there is a meteor, we didn't see coming for all that time?

This game shows how it feels to be at a point of worthlessness.

What it is like, to be a piece of history. A history no one will ever remember.
